title: Enhancing Mathematics Learning Satisfaction Through Social Relationship Building in Online Remote Learning Environments

context.additional_context: Short-term course for current practitioners to learn foundational math concepts for enhancing job competencies. Conducted offline but includes objectives to pre-train social relationship-building strategies required for future online learning

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate in mathematical problem-solving by leveraging various social networks (weak/strong ties)
Learners can apply communication strategies utilizing social capital (bridging/bonding) to actual learning contexts
Learners can explain the impact of social relationship formation in online learning environments on learning satisfaction

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Collaboration Platform App

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
